summary: The 2024-25 UEFA Champions League is the 70th edition of Europe's top soccer tournament. This season introduces a new format with 36 teams playing eight games each in a league phase. The final will take place in Munich, Germany, on May 31, 2025. The winners will earn a spot in the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League and other prestigious tournaments. Real Madrid, who won their 15th title last season, are the defending champions.
